entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 10 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 10 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 21.
